--- alter_table_replace_row_deletion_policy.sql
alter table foo replace row deletion policy ( older_than ( bar, interval 30 day ))

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 15,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &ast.ReplaceRowDeletionPolicy{
    Replace:           16,
    RowDeletionPolicy: &ast.RowDeletionPolicy{
      Row:        24,
      ColumnName: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 59,
        NameEnd: 62,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      NumDays: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 73,
        ValueEnd: 75,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "30",
      },
      Rparen: 81,
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo REPLACE ROW DELETION POLICY ( OLDER_THAN ( bar, INTERVAL 30 DAY ))
